title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the project requirements, including the technical specifications for capturing and processing brainwave data (outline the hardware/software requirements for EEG devices, signal processing algorithms, and storage solutions, specify the required sample rate, resolution, and filtering methods), security standards (encryption methods, secure data transfer protocols, access controls, outline key management strategies, and discuss potential vulnerabilities such as replay attacks), user experience expectations (intuitive interface design, minimal latency, error handling, ensure real-time feedback is provided to users for successful/unsuccessful verification), data privacy and compliance requirements (GDPR, HIPAA, etc., define procedures for anonymization, pseudonymization, and consent management), integration with existing systems or third-party services (API documentation, connectivity requirements, discuss potential APIs for authentication, authorization, and notification purposes), and performance benchmarks (define key metrics such as verification accuracy, processing time, and system availability). Collaborate with the project team to ensure all aspects of the system are accounted for. Suggest potential use-cases for the system and its expected impact. Once requirements are defined, consider breaking down this task into smaller subtasks for better management and tracking. The subtasks could include: 1. Hardware/software specifications for EEG devices 2. Signal processing algorithms and storage solutions 3. Security standards and key management strategies 4. User experience design 5. Data privacy and compliance requirements 6. Integration with third-party services 7. Performance benchmarks and use-cases. Upon completion of these subtasks, assign each to appropriate team members based on their expertise. For clarity, suggest breaking down the 'Collaborate with the project team' step into separate tasks for different team members (e.g., technical requirements collaboration, user experience collaboration, security collaboration, etc.). On completion of the revised subtasks, reassign this task to the Project Manager for review and approval. If necessary, update the rfc_state field to 'REVIEW'.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Develop the overall system architecture, including components for brainwave data acquisition, processing, storage, and identity verification.

title: Implement Brainwave Data Acquisition
description: Develop the software and hardware components for capturing and digitizing brainwave signals from users.

title: Develop Brainwave Processing Pipeline
description: Implement algorithms and data processing techniques to extract unique brainwave signatures from the acquired data.

title: Design and Implement Database
description: Create a secure and scalable database to store and manage brainwave signatures and user identities.

title: Develop Identity Verification Module
description: Implement the core functionality for verifying user identities based on their brainwave signatures.

title: Build User Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for capturing brainwave data and initiating identity verification.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Integrate robust security protocols and encryption techniques to protect user data and ensure system integrity.

title: Conduct System Integration and Testing
description: Perform comprehensive testing of the integrated system, including functional, performance, and security testing.

title: Deploy and Monitor System
description: Set up the production environment, deploy the system, and implement monitoring and logging mechanisms.

title: Create Documentation and User Guides
description: Develop comprehensive documentation, including system architecture diagrams, API references, and user guides.
